Method Detail

setTabSize

public void setTabSize(int size)
Sets the number of spaces to use to replace a tab. Assumes that any maximum constraint is enforced elsewhere, as only a minimum is enforced by this method (must be greater than 0).

Parameters:
size - The number of spaces used to replace a tab character

indentNewLine

public String indentNewLine(int offset)
Assuming the last key typed was enter, automatically indents the new line to line up with the indentation of the previous line. This method must be called when the caret is at the position of the new line; if it is called at any other time, the character at the current edit point will be replace with a newline character.
